Beating Heart.name: Beating Heart
Beating Heart.description: On death, respawn in the Red Plane. Single use per stack.

Lifetime Fortune.name: Lifetime Fortune
Lifetime Fortune.description: Gain bonus gold on entering a stage.

Shell Piece.name: Shell Piece
Shell Piece.description: Gain temporary immunity near death (once per stage).

Toxic Tail.name: Toxic Tail
Toxic Tail.description: Spawn two friendly boars which attack enemies.

Unearthly Lamp.name: Unearthly Lamp
Unearthly Lamp.description: Every second attack fires a projectile dealing 125% damage.

Armed Backpack.name: Armed Backpack
Armed Backpack.description: 18.5% chance of firing a bullet behind you for 150% damage.

Brass Knuckles.name: Brass Knuckles
Brass Knuckles.description: Deal 35% extra damage to close enemies.

Coffee Bag.name: Coffee Bag
Coffee Bag.description: Increases movement speed by 10% and attack speed by 7.5%.
Coffee Bag.stack: Further increases movement speed by 10% and attack speed by 7.5%.

Detritive Trematode.name: Detritive Trematode
Detritive Trematode.description: Enemies receive damage over time upon dropping below 3% health.
Detritive Trematode.stack: increases the health threshold up to 100% health at 35 stacks.

Distinctive Stick.name: Distinctive Stick
Distinctive Stick.description: Grows a tree at the Teleporter's location, healing nearby players.

Dormant Fungus.name: Dormant Fungus
Dormant Fungus.description: While moving, heal around 1% of your health every 1.8 seconds.

Guarding Amulet.name: Guarding Amulet
Guarding Amulet.description: Reduces damage taken from behind you by 40%.

Ice Tool.name: Ice Tool
Ice Tool.description: Gain an extra jump on walls, increases speed while climbing.
Ice Tool.stack: +1 jump, further increases speed up to 500%.

Malice.name: Malice
Malice.description: Dealt damage spreads to one nearby enemy for 55% damage.

Molten Coin.name: Molten Coin
Molten Coin.description: 6% chance to blaze enemies and earn +$1.

Needles.name: Needles
Needles.description: 4% chance to mark enemies on hit for 100% extra critical strike chance. Lasts 3 seconds.

Wonder Herbs.name: Wonder Herbs
Wonder Herbs.description: Increases healing from all sources by 12%.

Curse of Affliction.name: Curse of Affliction
Curse of Affliction.description: Falling below 50% health gives negative regeneration.

Curse of Confusion.name: Curse of Confusion
Curse of Confusion.description: Controls are temporarily inverted every minute.

Curse of Misfortune.name: Curse of Misfortune
Curse of Misfortune.description: Reduce the rarity of nearby items, rerolling them.
Curse of Misfortune.stack: Items always reroll at common rarity.

Curse of Mortality.name: Curse of Mortality
Curse of Mortality.description: Consecutive hits deal more damage to you.
Curse of Mortality.stack: Increases time frame for consecutive hits.

Composite Injector.name: Composite Injector
Composite Injector.description: Merge one dropped use item with the one equipped.

Droid Head.name: Droid Head
Droid Head.description: Spawns a helping drone for 11 seconds after killing boss enemies.

Green Chocolate.name: Green Chocolate
Green Chocolate.description: Receiving 25% or more of your health as damage increases your critical chance and damage for 5 seconds.

Insecticide.name: Insecticide
Insecticide.description: All attacks poison enemies for 25% damage over 4 seconds.

Juddering Egg.name: Juddering Egg
Juddering Egg.description: Gain a young wurm follower which attacks nearby enemies.

Nkota's Heritage.name: Nkota's Heritage
Nkota's Heritage.description: Creates a free chest on level up.
Nkota's Heritage.stack: Increases the chances of a higher rarity chest.

Portable Reactor.name: Portable Reactor
Portable Reactor.description: Become invincible for 40 seconds after entering a stage.
Portable Reactor.stack: Further increases duration by 15 seconds, with a maximum of 150 seconds at 8 stacks.

Swift Skateboard.name: Swift Skateboard
Swift Skateboard.description: Allows for movement during skill use.

Toys.name: Baby's Toys
Toys.description: -3 levels on pickup, however you keep all stats (Reduced level up experience requirement).
Toys.stack: Further reduces your level while keeping all stats.

Relic of Duality.name: Relic of Duality
Relic of Duality.description: All attacks apply burning damage over time, getting hit freezes you.
Relic of Duality.stack: increases the duration of both effects.

Relic of Extinction.name: Relic of Extinction
Relic of Extinction.description: A black hole follows you, dealing extreme damage on proximity.
Relic of Extinction.stack: Increases the size of the black hole.

Relic of Force.name: Relic of Force
Relic of Force.description: Increases damage by 100%, reduces attack speed and cooldowns by 40%.
Relic of Force.stack: Further increases cooldowns and reduces attack speed multiplicatively.

Relic of Gratification.name: Relic of Gratification
Relic of Gratification.description: Enemies drop 150% experience and gold BUT enemies deal 150% damage to you.

Relic of Mass.name: Relic of Mass
Relic of Mass.description: Increases health by 100%, speed requires momentum.
Relic of Mass.stack: Further increases health by 100% health, slower momentum buildup.

Relic of Vitality.name: Relic of Vitality
Relic of Vitality.description: Increases regeneration by 12 hp/s, reduces health by 75% and armor by 50%.

Augury.name: Augury
Augury.description: Receiving damage charges dark energy. Unleash a devastating blackout on full charge.

Entangled Energy.name: Entangled Energy
Entangled Energy.description: Create an energetic discharge if 4 or more enemies stand in a line in front of you.

Stirring Soul.name: Stirring Soul
Stirring Soul.description: Killed enemies leave a soul. Souls have a chance of turning into items on contact.

Yearning Demise.name: Yearning Demise
Yearning Demise.description: Picking up items annihilates the nearest enemies.

Broken Blood Tester.name: Broken Blood Tester
Broken Blood Tester.description: Earn +2 gold for every 15 hp regenerated.

Crowning Valiance.name: Crowning Valiance
Crowning Valiance.description: All stats are increased when a boss is in proximity.

Cryptic Source.name: Cryptic Source
Cryptic Source.description: Changing direction creates bursts of energy that deal 70% damage.

Field Accelerator.name: Field Accelerator
Field Accelerator.description: Teleporters charge 100% faster when no enemies are around.

Gold Medal.name: Gold Medal
Gold Medal.description: Spending gold heals you for 5 seconds.

Hottest Sauce.name: Hottest Sauce
Hottest Sauce.description: Activating a use item burns the ground and all nearby enemies for 5 seconds.

Hunter's Sigil.name: Hunter's Sigil
Hunter's Sigil.description: Standing still increases armor by 15 and Critical Strike chance by 25%.
Hunter's Sigil.stack: Further increases armor by 10 and critical chance by 20%%.

Low Quality Speakers.name: Low Quality Speakers
Low Quality Speakers.description: Earn a speed boost at 45% health or lower.

Metachronic Trinket.name: Metachronic Trinket
Metachronic Trinket.description: Teleporter charge time is reduced by 10 seconds
Metachronic Trinket.stack: Further decreases the required time by 10 seconds.

Poisonous Gland.name: Poisonous Gland
Poisonous Gland.description: On getting hit while at full health, create a cloud of poison for 200% dps.

Roulette.name: Roulette
Roulette.description: Get a random stat buff every minute.
Roulette.stack: Increases the stat buff's value by 50%

Strange Can.name: Strange Can
Strange Can.description: 8.5% chance to intoxicate enemies for 350% damage over time.

Voltaic Gauge.name: Voltaic Gauge
Voltaic Gauge.description: Killing elites drops orbs that grant 60 temporary shield.

Watch Metronome.name: Watch Metronome
Watch Metronome.description: Standing Still for up to 4 seconds charges movement speed for up to 2 seconds.

Ageless Totem.name: Ageless Totem
Ageless Totem.description: Become an aspect of Ethereality. On use creates an Ethereal explosion.

Caustic Pearl.name: Caustic Pearl
Caustic Pearl.extraInfo: ASPECT. Takes up an Equipment slot, but can not be used.
Caustic Pearl.description: Leave a trail that deals 20% corrosive damage to enemies. All attacks deal corrosive damage.

Counterfeit Teleporter.name: Counterfeit Teleporter
Counterfeit Teleporter.description: Place a teleporter anywhere. The item is removed upon use.

Eclipsing Shard.name: Eclipsing Shard
Eclipsing Shard.extraInfo: ASPECT. Takes up an Equipment slot, but can not be used.
Eclipsing Shard.description: Nearby enemies receive the Void debuff.

Fractured Crown.name: Fractured Crown
Fractured Crown.extraInfo: ASPECT. Takes up an Equipment slot, but can not be used.
Fractured Crown.description: Every 10 seconds, fire a laser at the nearest enemy for 20x14% damage.

Greater Warbanner.name: Greater Warbanner
Greater Warbanner.description: Place a warbanner which decreases skill cooldowns, increasing critical strike chance by 20 and health by 100.

M.I.D.A.S.name: M.I.D.A.S
M.I.D.A.S.description: Deducts 50% of your health, earning the same amount as gold.
M.I.D.A.S.embryo: Earns you double the amount of gold.

Pressurized Propeller.name: Pressurized Propeller
Pressurized Propeller.description: Launch yourself high in the air.

Pylon Fragment.name: Pylon Fragment
Pylon Fragment.description: Partially restore the Pylon's health in the Red Plane, the item is removed upon use.

Seismic Oscillator.name: Seismic Oscillator
Seismic Oscillator.description: Start an earthquake which damages all grounded enemies for 65% damage.

Simple Magnet.name: Simple Magnet
Simple Magnet.description: Pull surrounding pickups towards you. 10% Chance to unearth a treasure.
Simple Magnet.embryo: Increases chance by 10%. Doubled active duration.
